articles.title: FPJ Edit: The selection of Anil Menon, an American of Indian origin, as one of 10 future astronauts by NASA - Free Press Journal
articles.description: FPJ Edit: The selection of Anil Menon, an American of Indian origin, as one of 10 future astronauts by NASA marks a new turning point in space mission history
articles.content: The selection of Anil Menon, an American of Indian origin, as one of the 10 future astronauts by NASA marks a new turning point in the history of space missions. He is a pilot of the American Air For… [+1622 chars]

articles.title: Nick Cannon's 5-month-old son, Zen, has died of brain cancer - CBC News
articles.description: American entertainer Nick Cannon announced his son's tragic death during a taping of The Nick Cannon Show on Tuesday.
articles.content:
Nick Cannon's five-month-old son Zen has died from brain cancer.
During a taping of The Nick Cannon Show on Tuesday which Cannon referred to as a "celebration of life"  the former America's Got Tale… [+1490 chars]

articles.title: 'Cause you're a Singapore boy': US rappers' song sparks creative spin-offs on TikTok - AsiaOne
articles.description: There are many ways to show off one's national identity, but some TikTokers have found a better option — by using a soundbite from an American rapper. The viral TikTok soundbite goes, "Cause you're a Singapore boy, or you an island boy". American rapper Flyys…
articles.content:
